dialogue_text:
~ start
Merchant: Greetings, traveler! I have rare wares from distant lands.
Merchant: Perhaps you'd like to see my collection?
- Yes, show me your wares
	Merchant: Excellent! Though I warn you, my prices are... fair.
	=> END
- No, thank you
	Merchant: Your loss. These opportunities don't come often.
	=> END
